1001.name: ErrGetLatestReleasesCode
1001.long_description: Unable to get the latest release info from the GithubAPI

1003.name: ErrInstallUsingIstioctlCode
1003.long_description: Error occurred while installing istio mesh through istioctl

1006.name: ErrMeshConfigCode
1006.long_description: Error getting MeshSpecKey config from in-memory configuration

1007.name: ErrRunIstioCtlCmdCode
1007.probable_cause:
Corrupted istioctl binary
Command might be invalid

1008.name: ErrSampleAppCode
1008.long_description: Error occurred while trying to install a sample application using manifests
1008.suggested_remediation: Reconnect your adapter to meshery server to refresh the kubeclient

1010.name: ErrApplyPolicyCode
1010.long_description: Error occurred while trying to install a sample application using manifests
1010.suggested_remediation: Reconnect your adapter to meshery server to refresh the kubeclient

1011.name: ErrCustomOperationCode
1011.long_description: Error occurred while applying custom manifest to the cluster

1013.name: ErrInvalidInstallationProfileCode
1013.short_description: Error while installing istio due to wrong profile
1013.suggested_remediation: Provide one of the profiles: \"demo\",\"minimal\",\"default\" profiles

1014.name: ErrCreatingIstioClientCode
1014.short_description: Unable to create a new istio client

1016.name: ErrIstioVetCode
1016.short_description: error while running Istio vet command

1017.name: ErrParseOAMComponentCode
1017.long_description: Error occurred while parsing application component in the OAM request made by Meshery server
1017.probable_cause: Could not unmarshall configuration component received via ProcessOAM gRPC call into a valid Component struct
1017.suggested_remediation: Check if Meshery Server is creating valid component for ProcessOAM gRPC call. This error should never happen and can be reported as a bug in Meshery Server. Also check if Meshery Server and adapters are referring to same component struct provided in MeshKit.

1018.name: ErrParseOAMConfigCode
1018.long_description: Error occurred while parsing configuration in the request made by Meshery Server
1018.probable_cause: Could not unmarshall OAM config received via ProcessOAM gRPC call into a valid Config struct
1018.suggested_remediation: Check if Meshery Server is creating valid config for ProcessOAM gRPC call. This error should never happen and can be reported as a bug in Meshery Server. Also, confirm that Meshery Server and Adapters are referring to same config struct provided in MeshKit

1019.name: ErrNilClientCode
1019.suggested_remediation: Reconnect the adaptor to Meshery server

1020.name: ErrParseIstioCoreComponentCode
1020.short_description: istio core component manifest parsing failing

1022.name: ErrOpInvalidCode
1022.long_description: Istio adapter received an invalid operation from the meshey server
1022.probable_cause:
The operation is not supported by the adapter
Invalid operation name
1022.suggested_remediation: Check if the operation name is valid and supported by the adapter

1025.name: ErrApplyHelmChartCode
1025.short_description: Error occurred while applying Helm Chart

1026.name: ErrGettingIstioReleaseCode
1026.short_description: Error occurred while fetching Istio release artifacts

1027.name: ErrUnsupportedPlatformCode
1027.long_description: Istio only supports Windows, Linux and Darwin
1027.short_description: requested platform is not supported by Istio

1029.name: ErrDownloadingTarCode
1029.short_description: Error occurred while downloading Istio tar

1031.name: ErrMakingBinExecutableCode
1031.short_description: Error while making istioctl an executable

1033.name: ErrFetchIstioVersionsCode
1033.long_description: versions for istio could not be fetched
1033.short_description: could not get any istio versions
1033.probable_cause:
could not reach github.com/istio/istio/releases
no versions could be fetched from istio release page
1033.suggested_remediation: make sure adapter is reachable to github
